trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Everett
There were no other sightings in Everett on or around July 31st 2012
Summary: Two vertically flying, cigar shaped objects with coordinated movements, ascended, hovered, then dissappeared.
divs: sighting details1. outside of house walking dog, saw two stange vertical shapes in the far of north-bound distance just above the horizon. 2. noticed two strange, vertically ascending reflective shapes. first thought they may have been incoming missiles. 3. get out of seattle, missiles are coming. 4. the objects were the same size relative to one another. began flying vertically from two different origins. then began to come towards one another, with one passing the other and aligning vertically, one above the other. held a hover for several minutes and were both wobbling\vibrating continuously. bottom craft dissappeared about 30 seconds or so before the top one. no clouds in the sky to obstruct view. continued to watch top craft vibrate before disssappearing. it did not fly away, it just vanished. 5. felt excited! first experience in witnessing a ufo. happy to have shared it with muy wife, who saw the exact same things. looking forward to the big reveal! 6. it vanished.
